issue.subject: SQL changes of #1231 and #1239 are not reflected in other DBMS and update scripts + missing FK
issue.description:
*1)* SQL changes of #1231 and #1239 are not reflected in other DBMS and update scripts.
Changes are: */joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_core/src/administrator/sql/install/mysql/install.sql*
@`attribution` VARCHAR(255) -> `attribution` TEXT@ in @#__sdi_maplayer@ and
adding @`access_key` varchar(255)@ to @#__sdi_processing_order@

They should also appear in :
/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_core/src/administrator/sql/install/postgresql/install.sql
/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_core/src/administrator/sql/install/sqlsrv/install.sql
+ update scripts in :
/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_core/src/administrator/sql/install/mysql/install.sql
/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_core/src/administrator/sql/install/postgresql/install.sql
/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_core/src/administrator/sql/install/sqlsrv/install.sql

*2)* There seems to be no foreign keys in the _processing_ tables, I think there should be some (process_order ⇒ user , process_order ⇒ process, etc)

*3)* MSSQL scripts look broken: 
- identifiers: @`created` [nvarchar]@ instead of @[created] [nvarchar]@
- types missmatch, example: On MySQL @`status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT ''@ is differently typed on MSSQL : @`status` [int] NOT NULL@

journals.notes:
FKs are OK (#1283), PGSQL will be removed, and MSSQL is not tested.
I propose to reject this issue since there's no code attached, and n reason to keep it open...
That do you think Thomas ?
